original_text: And the second day they marched around the city once, and returned into the camp. So they did for six days.
korean_text: 그 둘째 날에도 그 성을 한 번 돌고 진영으로 돌아오니라 엿새 동안을 이같이 행하니라

sentences.original_text: they marched around the city once
So they did for six days.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여섯 날 동안 그렇게 했습니다.
